page.title: 14Hove Park School
page.content: The school is one of great character, as well as conflicting architecture; it has been altered to cope with increasing numbers and change in role from 1930's Girls' Grammar to a 1980's mixed comprehensive for over 500 14-18 year olds. The school has many activities.There is a school council where pupils exchange views on the running of the school.A musical is performed every year.There are football,basketball, rugby,netball,tennis and badminton teams as well as dancers and trampolinists.There are 3 magazines; Omnibus,the official one,HP Sauce run by the sixth formers and a role playing magazine called Critical Hit. Subject trips and an exchange visit to Cologne have taken place this year. 1985 marks the school's 50th anniversary.
